title: MORTAL KOMBAT XL PREMIUM EDITION REPACK
description:
System requirements:
Operating system: the Windows Vista, / 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
CPU: the Core the i5 750 2.67 GHz / Phenom II X4 965 3.4 GHz
Memory: 3 GB
Video Card: 1 GB, GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850, DirectX 11
Sound card: compatible with DirectX 11
Free space on HDD: 40 GB

Description:
Mortal Kombat XL - the new generation of fighting game and the next chapter of the legendary series of the famous studio NetherRealm. The developers managed to create the most entertaining and deep fighting game in the history of Mortal Kombat, where violent fights cinematic quality teamed with new gameplay elements. All Mortal Kombat X characters have several styles of combat, in which use completely different special moves and combos.


DLCS:
Kombat Pack
Kombat Pack 2
Predator
Predator / Prey Pack
Brazil Pack
Tanya
Klassic Pack 1
Kold War Pack
Jason Voorhees
Horror Pack
Unlock all Krypt Items
Samurai Pack
Blue Steel Sub-Zero
Goro
Tremor
Klassic Pack 2
Triborg
Alien
Bo'Rai Cho
Leatherface
Apocalypse Pack
Cosplay Pack
Krimson Ermac 

Note ! : Disable anti-virus before install to prevent file deletions.

How to install :

Mount/burn
Install
Play
